document.full_text: the odds are always stacked against opposition candidates in singapore elections and for nicole seah, a political novice contesting in the backyard of a popular former prime minister, they should be overwhelming.
document.title: facebook, youtube the new battlegrounds in singapore elections
lines_and_colors: the odds are always stacked against opposition candidates in singapore elections and for nicole seah, a political novice contesting in the backyard of a popular former prime minister, they should be overwhelming.
